Title: Authorizes matching funding for savings achieved for actions between local governments that are later included as part of an approved county-wide shared services plan
Summary: Authorizes matching funding for savings achieved for actions between local governments that are later included as part of an approved county-wide shared services plan.
LawCode: Amd ยง239-bb, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to authorizing matching funding for savings achieved for actions between local governments that are later included as part of an approved county-wide shared services plan
